trans-unit.source: Apache Spark Job Server on HDInsight | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Apache Spark Job Server on HDInsight | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the Spark Job Server to remotely submit and manage jobs on a Spark cluster.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the Spark Job Server to remotely submit and manage jobs on a Spark cluster.

trans-unit.source: Spark Job Server on Azure HDInsight clusters
trans-unit.target: Spark Job Server on Azure HDInsight clusters

trans-unit.source: Apache Spark cluster on Azure HDInight packages the Spark Job Server as part of the cluster deployment.
trans-unit.target: Apache Spark cluster on Azure HDInight packages the Spark Job Server as part of the cluster deployment.

trans-unit.source: Spark Job Server provides REST APIs to create Spark context, submit Spark application to context, check job status, kill context, etc.
trans-unit.target: Spark Job Server provides REST APIs to create Spark context, submit Spark application to context, check job status, kill context, etc.

trans-unit.source: This article provides some examples on how to use Curl to perform some common tasks on a Spark cluster using a Job Server.
trans-unit.target: This article provides some examples on how to use Curl to perform some common tasks on a Spark cluster using a Job Server.

trans-unit.source: For complete documentation for the Spark Job Server, see <link><linkText>https://github.com/spark-jobserver/spark-jobserver</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For complete documentation for the Spark Job Server, see <link><linkText>https://github.com/spark-jobserver/spark-jobserver</linkText><title></title></link>.
